quiz_item.error_analysis: 学生易因形近词“contact”（联系）或字面直译“对抗”，将“(in|by) contrast”误理解为“与...相反”而非“与...对比”
quiz_item.sentence: City life is fast-paced and noisy; **by contrast**, life in the countryside is much more peaceful.

option.definition: 与...联系；与...接触（形近词“contact”的误导）
与...相反；与...对抗（字面直译“对抗”的错误）
与...相同；与...一致（反义干扰）
